name: Mergest Kingdom
summary: We haven’t released any merge games on our site so far, so it’s high time to fix the flaw. Welcome to the magic kingdom plagued by a dark force. Match 3 items to create a new object and help to restore the realm. A mix of simulation and match 3 games, this free merge game online will appeal to both children and adult audiences. Fantasy artwork and relaxing matching gameplay makes makes it pure fun to play full screen without download. Create new items and unlock more characters, reclaim new parts of the map and enjoy the evermerge game online for free.
